    3-Day Wellness Immersion

    3 days to move, learn, and reset. Choose what speaks to you from our live schedule and enjoy a welcoming, all-levels wellness experience designed to leave you feeling your best.

    3-Day Wellness Immersion

    Your Complete Wellness Escape on Koh Tao

    Immerse yourself in three transformative days of yoga, pilates, Sound healing and holistic wellness. This intensive experience combines nine carefully curated classes, three specialized workshops, and access to our signature ice bath therapy all designed to reset your body, calm your mind, and rejuvenate your spirit.

    What to Bring

    ‚úì Comfortable, breathable workout clothes

    ‚úì Water bottle (hydration is key!)

    ‚úì Towel for post-ice bath

    ‚úì Open mind and willingness to try new things

    Preparation Tips

    üëâ Chat with us / Book your Retreatüåø

    Before Your Arrival

    • Stay hydrated in the days leading up to your immersion
    • Get good sleep the night before
    • Eat a light, healthy meal before classes
    • Let us know about any injuries or modifications needed

    During Your 3 Days

    • Attend classes consistently for best results
    • Hydrate throughout the day
    • Eat nourishing meals (we can recommend local options)
    • Journal your experiences and insights
    • Connect with other participants

    After Your Immersion

    • Continue your practice at home
    • Implement the workshop learnings
    • Stay in touch with your new wellness community
    • Consider follow-up classes or packages
